transcript: You can put green paint all over your body and dance naked in the palace spend dome and rush off madly with all the men in the world and I chance say a word as long as you love me best.

segments.text: You can put green paint all over your body and dance naked in the palace spend dome
and rush off madly with all the men in the world and I chance say a word as long as you love me best.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: You can put green paint all over your body and dance naked in the Place Vendome and rush off madly with all the men in the world and I shan't say a word as long as you love me best.
